title: Herzlichen Glückwunsch
content:
On antique greeting card. If you’re gonna have a Glückwunsch,  
Herzlichen is the way to go. And you’ll want to wash it down with a big stein of dark beer. That’s my guess, and I’m sticking to it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229080101im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/gluckwunschsm_6430.jpg)

 [‹ InDesign CS2 / Block of colour behind paragraphs of text](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229080101/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34087 "Go to previous forum topic") [Visualmente -\> Tipograficamente ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229080101/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34078 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fontplayer
